title: How do I export and import contacts in a UIM card?
answer:
1.         Importing contacts in a UIM card to your phone


 −       Touch **People** > ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45283) > **Manage contacts** > **Copy contacts** > **UIM**. Select the contacts you want to copy from the UIM card or touch **All**. Then touch **COPY** > **Phone**. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45284) 

 2.         Exporting contacts in your phone to a UIM card 

 Touch **People** > ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45285) > **Manage contacts** > **Copy contacts** > **Phone**. Select the contacts you want to copy from your phone or touch **All**. Then touch **COPY** > **UIM**.
